description: {"blocks":[{"key":"84jf3","text":"This protocol describes how to express and purify human NEMO (IKK-γ) tagged N-terminally with GST and EGFP. The expression is performed with E. coli Rosetta pLysS cells. The protein is purified via a GST batch purification and gel filtration (SEC). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":141,"length":8}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

funders.grant_id: Mechanisms of mitochondrial damage control by PINK1 and Parkin (ASAP-000350)

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"frpiv","text":"Grow E. coli Rosetta (DE3) pLysS cells in   LB medium at   until achieving an OD600 nm of 0.4. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":5,"length":7},{"style":"sub","offset":80,"length":7}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":42,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":57,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"eenle","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"2","error":false,"guid":"956C4C20054C11EEBF94D164CA237311","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":3}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"A62CC7B0054C11EEBF94D164CA237311","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2d2hh","text":"Reduce temperature to   and continue growth to OD600 nm of 0.8. {"blocks":[{"key":"fjjht","text":"Induce protein expression with   IPTG and continue growth for ~  at   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":31,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":63,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":68,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4taed","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"250","error_concentration":false,"guid":"D26F58B0054C11EEBF94D164CA237311","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":29}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":57600,"guid":"EDBE2920054C11EEBF94D164CA237311","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"2":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"F43261E0054C11EEBF94D164CA237311","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"18","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5807d","text":"Centrifuge the cells at 3000 rcf (  ,  )","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":34,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":37,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6q703","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"027951F0054D11EEBF94D164CA237311","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":900,"guid":"076B3070054D11EEBF94D164CA237311","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7f3fm","text":"Aspirate media and resuspend cell pellet in ~ 10 ml of 1X PBS, centrifuge the cells at 3000 rcf (  ,  ) and take off the supernatant. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":97,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":100,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"C74C8F8906A211EE9CEF0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":900,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"C74C905806A211EE9CEF0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":false,"start":null,"temperature":"4","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"30ca","text":"Flash freeze the pellet in liquid nitrogen and store at   until use.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":56,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"34k6l","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"24F1EF80054D11EEBF94D164CA237311","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"-80","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"lssc","text":"Thaw pellet and resuspend in Lysis Buffer with freshly added   β-Mercaptoethanol, Roche Protease Inhibitor and DNAse I","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":61,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"889rc","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"2","error_concentration":false,"guid":"98C23870054D11EEBF94D164CA237311","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":28}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e5h7k","text":"Sonicate sample   at 65% power for 5 cycles (Bandelin Sonopuls)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":16,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8b3e3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":30,"guid":"D6E69380054D11EEBF94D164CA237311","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8hvtg","text":"Centrifuge at 48000 rcf at   for  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":27,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":33,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"au9kv","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"173596C0054E11EEBF94D164CA237311","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":2700,"guid":"1B1716B0054E11EEBF94D164CA237311","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"fpjui","text":"Repeat sonication for a total of 3X ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fb9t3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1tf5l","text":"Incubate the sample on equilibrated beads on a tube roller at   for   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":62,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":68,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"jgh9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"DD15B780054E11EEBF94D164CA237311","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":14400,"guid":"DE6AC030054E11EEBF94D164CA237311","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"55afg","text":"During this step, equilibrate   Glutathione Sepharose 4B beads by washing the slurry with water and Wash Buffer 1 (~ 6 ml).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":30,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"3","error":false,"guid":"A0EBA2BE054E11EEB25E0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ebiog","text":"Filter supernatant after centrifugation through  a   syringe filter ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":51,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"thickness","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error":false,"guid":"C32A1F42054E11EEB25E0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":202,"value":"0.45"}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"9o9gg","text":"Wash beads 5X with Wash Buffer 1","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cr9s2","text":"Wash beads 1X with Wash Buffer 2","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9k3pq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a7m8j","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"fqjcs","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"97psh","text":"These wash steps remove nonspecific proteins","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"56q4h","text":"Wash beads 2X with Wash Buffer 1","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9s6h","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"19g2a","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"5n8dh","text":"These washes remove high salt concentration","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"77o8s","text":"Cleave the resulting sample to produce GFP-NEMO by incubating with thrombin   at  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":76,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":81,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"44lmf","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":14400,"guid":"9E30AF10054F11EEBF94D164CA237311","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":["overnight"],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"B9C53B10054F11EEBF94D164CA237311","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2nu3f","text":"Centrifuge beads at 3000 rcf for   at  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":33,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":38,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"698dn","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":180,"guid":"CBDDCC90054F11EEBF94D164CA237311","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"CD443A60054F11EEBF94D164CA237311","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f3adc","text":"Collect supernatant and filter through   syringe filter","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":39,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3en2t","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"thickness","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error":false,"guid":"E39CE690054F11EEBF94D164CA237311","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":202,"value":".45"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6m747","text":"Concentrate product to a final volume of   using a 10 kDa MWCO concentrator","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":41,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2rq4n","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"500","error":false,"guid":"048D5D80055011EEBF94D164CA237311","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4r8s8","text":"The concentrated and filtered protein can be applied onto a Superose 6 increase column (10/300 Cytiva) pre-equillibrated with SEC buffer","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4vt4l","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"a4ht5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"8n561","text":"This step can remove contamination and degradation products","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bqrhk","text":"Fractions containing the purified proteins are pooled, concentrated, frozen in liquid nitrogen and stored at - 80°C ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a2hr8","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6l7u","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"23ng6","text":"Protein purity can be determined by SDS PAGE analysis and measurement of protein concentration","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}
